activity.text:
super interesting project for LLM programming! prompts are increasingly complex, yet the best interface most libraries provide to build them is... python f-strings.

LMQL offers control over model behavior through token masking + control flow, really excited to try it out

quoted.text:
üöÄ Excited to announce the first release of https://t.co/phw1uWlPEF, a novel open source programming language and platform for language model interaction!

Combining prompts, constraints & scripting, LMQL elevates the capabilities of large language models.

üßµ1/6 A quick tour. https://t.co/7Sv8rL2mtB
